documents.document: Best half time show EVER!
@jannarden not the exciting reprieve we hoped for. Brady might go home and snuggle in the supermodel bosom. #americaisgreat
Has Trump gone silent? He surely cannot stand for this ex so-called President Bush getting so much attention?!
Will the US let Barack in after his vacation, isn't he Muslim?! Surprised Trump hasn't thought of that insane angle.
@whiterockcity no one out shoveling the promenade, our main attraction?!
The city of Vancouver and surrounding municipalities continue to fail miserably as the snow falls. #budgetwinsoversafety#commonsense
Love you guys but really don't need to see weather updates every 7 minutes. More news please!
Whew!And I was worried Trump would do something stupid, start a world war and stand up for big banks Vs the people that voted for him.
@DaveSFoley @realDonaldTrump Nailed it!
So the first thing he attacked was the American homeowner. #keepamerica'sbankprofitsgreat
Quite the turn out at the marches. It only begs one question..who did vote for Trump?
@BarackObama Yes it is still on and we welcome you. Enjoy your family time and wishing you all good things from your supporters in Canada!
The real star in the HBO special on Phil Spector is those wigs.
Watching Mascots, haven't laughed this hard in so long. Witty, brilliant stuff - thanks to all of you!
Well who doesn't want to ramp up nukes for the holidays and new year?! Thanks Donald. Can someone please take twitter away from this idiot.
It makes sense to pay a toll for a bridge where ice falls from it and can potentially kill you or at the very least wreck your car.
Well he might make America great again as people will unite for change. At least, we hope.
Helluva game. Epic finish for a great story by both teams!
It's hard to say who is more annoying, CNN or Donald Trump.
@LastWeekTonight @HBO your Canadian fans look forward to it.
@BCLions Burnham is a machine today - way to go!
@NEWS1130Traffic avoid 1st Ave eastbound from Clarke to the freeway. Construction makes it down to 1 lane
@mcleandarren way to kick up the party a notch buddy!
@ArleneDickinson @TheEmmys I have always been baffled by the writing for awards shows. Do good writers turn down the gig?!
@mcleandarren did I tell you how much I love O'Hara Lane?!
@NEWS1130Traffic train crossing signal arm down at 168 and #10 for no apparent reason, traffic going around arm
@DriveBC train crossing signal arm down for no apparent reason on 168 in Surrey approaching #10
@BCLions Lions eat Tigers for breakfast. Go BC!
@MMFlint one of the wittier shows around for sure!
Really White Rock, living in this gorgeous community and copter noise is disturbing your blessed lifestyle?! #getalife
@dana_gee have a great Canadian night!
Whew,turns out the police in Florida were trying to save the black man lying on his back with his hands in the air when they shot him....
@TravisLulay @adidasCA We are the ones honored that you are a Lion! Happy July 4th!
@SHO_RayDonovan @LievSchreiber lookin' forward to it!
@BCLions why on earth is this game not televised???Only the east game-don't get it!
@jesseropershow looking forward to you taking the stage in Abbotsford!
@TheRealDiceClay outstanding show, a highlight of every week. Thanks for the laughs!
@GlobalBC Police incident on Parker in White Rock. SWAT team out in force with the road closed. Breaking story I would say!
@PeaceArchNews police incident on Parker, SWAT team out in force with the road closed. Breaking story I would say!
Full S.W.A.T team on our little street with guns in sight, making arrests. Who says White Rock is dull?!
@bchydro great thank you.
@bchydro we have had no replies via phone or FB on when a hydro pole will be removed from our lawn.Customer service would go a long way.
@LastWeekTonight checking out Chipotle for the first time. I am avid birdwatcher.
@dana_gee you are on fire tonight. Not sure if it is a compliment to say your material is better than anything on the show so far.
Sean, I get it. Charlie go home. Your bias, conservative and narrow view has never shed light on anything.
@RobLowe @TheGrinderFOX two thumbs up, witty writing and perfect casting on mainstream tv, who would've thought?! Keep it up!
@bchydro I do not see any estimates so far, only updates on crew arrivals?!
@TheGrinderFOX Stellar episode, nice to see you on tv again Timothy Olyphant!
@JustifiedFX anyone else miss Boyd and Ray? Oh and Pappy Van Winkle.
Oh Canada! Well I'll be darned.
Make sure voting is on your To Do list tomorrow Canadians!
@TheGrinderFOX Classic Rob Lowe, great casting all the way around. Looking forward to this show every week!
Welcome back Cookie! @TherealTaraji
My heart is sad to miss the Foo Fighters, sing loud and celebrate Congregation!
@bchydro power pole still down at Victoria and Vidal in White Rock
@bchydro there are more than 7 homes affected in White Rock, please update your list
@bchydro where do we go to get info?
@JTreliving finally getting to check out the BP at Beatty and Robson! Great place to start off a game night. Go Lions!
Travis Lulay is on fire!
Let's make the Redblacks black and blue - Go Lions!
@jannarden Sorry to interrupt your Sunday but I am digging The Real Thing by Paul Kype and Texas Flood,has Alberta hit all over it!
When you have an elected official who is riding roughshod over democracy...maybe that person needs to be pushed aside. Well said Jane Fonda
@westjet Cheers to all crew on 107 from Edm to http://t.co/uurziN2c59 notch service,communication and hospitality.Special nod to Karl.
Sonic Highways is like church to me, every song inspiring - what an album and a journey. Thank you!
@TheJeffBridges unbelievable show - thank you!
@TheJeffBridges Welcome to Vancouver, cannot wait to hear your band tonight!
@Real_Terrence_H your character on Empire might be the most diabolical and fabulous character on tv - well done!
@TherealTaraji West Coast is right here and loving every minute. From Agent Carter to Cookie - you are fabulous!
Team Raylan or Team Boyd?!
Welcome home @geroysimon, a win for the club and the city! Cannot wait until the season starts. All good things.
That awkward moment when you realize you are 3 items over in the express lane and they are lined up behind you.
I love Walton Goggins. For those who actually know who he is, you will appreciate this fully.
Photo radar end of knight street bridge going into Van. We filled one of the quota's for that officer today.
Does anyone care that Sherman is dying out there?!
That JUST happened - fly high Seahawks!!!
@katherinemonk "Lazy Susan of loopy characters" your reviews are rich and usually bang on.
@Rikester13 Great leadership and heart, you finished strong and should be proud. Heal up, we are looking forward to next season !
@MrTommyLand Great show in Vancouver, quite the coaster and energy, thanks man!
I predict Abel kills Gemma in a drive by...from his Big Wheel
I feel like if fitting all the dirty dishes into the dishwasher was an Olympic sport, I would be a gold medallist
At the risk of being bombarded with hateful tweets I must say the last season of SOA is not my fave
@rickmercer another week of being amazed at how the Conservative party hasn't taken you boating with a chain and brick, keep it up my friend
Happy Birthday @TravisLulay , may you have a special day topped off with a team win!
Ok Lions, there is more to a team than 1 man, there is a reason each of you are playing,not watching from the stands. You got this. ROAR.
Great workout today Kendrick, great All Out energy in the group!
Fingers crossed and wishing you all the best 14
Takin' a knee, way to go Lions! Classy support. http://t.co/GFL7DcAcw3
Sack attack followed by a TD - oh its on!
@BCLions looking forward to showing Rider Nation that Lions fans rule the Den
Grab a ticket and some orange Vancouver,let's show Rider nation who rules the Den!
I will miss this pose - to Geroy, the one and only! http://t.co/YDfisU43su
@BCLions Whose the Manny?! Yeah Lions!
@whiterockcity the lack of daily updates on the WR site is frustrating. Time for taxpayers to bring their food waste to city hall steps?!
For those of you in the 3hr line up at the border - save $,time and jobs by shopping in Canada
Big sky starry night tonight, I remember the old words, what is man that you are mindful of him. Don't spend so much time focused inward.
@BCLions Welcome Back 14 - nice TD!
@BCLions I support DeMarco but was waiting for an appearance by Buck -couldn't have hurt!
@BCLions beautiful play.
Crystal Mantie wrote: Orange finger nail polish, $6.99 - 6 Pack, $7.99 - BC Lions Hoodie $30 - Lions win tonight.. Priceless!
@jtimberlake so glad to hear you are coming back to Vancouver, what a great way for the west coast to start 2014
